title: Explore ERC-6551
description: ERC-6551 proposal defines a system that provides a smart contract account for each ERC-721 token. These token bound accounts allow ERC-721 tokens to own assets and interact with applications without the need to modify existing ERC-721 smart contracts or infrastructure.

questions.title: What is the core content of ERC-6551?
Which of the following are correct about Token Binding Accounts(TBA)?
options: Can own any type of on-chain assets

questions.title: Which of the following are correct about Token Binding Accounts(TBA)?
options: Owned by the holder of ERC-721 token
Right of control is delegated to the holder of ERC-721 token

questions.title: Each non-fungible token can only have one Token Binding Account(TBA)
What is the compatibility of ERC-6551?
options: Incompatible with previously deployed ERC-721 contracts
Backward compatible with most ERC-721 contracts

questions.title: Cryptopunks is incompatible with this proposal because the Cryptopunks contract does not implement which method?
What are the two main components of this proposal?
options: An unlicensed registry for deploying bound token accounts
Standard interface for implementing token binding accounts

questions.title: Which of the following are correct about the registry contract?
Which of the following is incorrect about the registry contract?
options: Deploy all Token Binding Account(TBA) contracts using the create2 opcode
The contract address of the Token Binding Account(TBA) can be calculated in advance before actual deployment
The contract address of the Token Binding Account(TBA) must be known after deployment

questions.title: What are the factors that affect the creation of Token Binding Account(TBA) contract addresses?
Which of the following are correct about the registry contract?
options: Create Token Binding Account(TBA) contracts through proxy mode
Create Token Binding Account(TBA) contracts directly
Can reuse existing on-chain Token Binding Account(TBA) contracts

questions.title: Transferring ERC-721 tokens to their Token Binding Account(TBA) will result in assets being unable to be withdrawn
